roleset.name: move back and down into a restful position
roleset.note: RECLINE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls spatial_configuration-47.6. Comparison to 'stand'. (from recline.01-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She reclined her head on the pillow.

example.name: intransitive without causal agent or location
example.src: intransitive without causal agent or location
example.type: intransitive without causal agent or location
example.text: The seat reclines to a full 160 degrees to provide the most comfortable sitting position possible.
example.arg: to provide the most comfortable sitting position possible.

example.name: intransitive with causal agent
example.text: As I recline, my head says more or less vertical.
